text: Receive or perform cryptocurrency payments as a business or an individual. No fees. No third-party.
moreText: Bitcart is using electrum wallet you know and love. Your private key never leaves your PC.

text: Fast, easy to use and secure
moreText: Bitcart is written to be fast and light, working on any kind of servers, or at your home PC

text: Your private keys are never required to use Bitcart
moreText:
Your keys - your bitcoin!
You can use your public key, or just a set of addresses to watch for

text: Ready to use admin panel and store for your business
moreText:
Bitcart provides optional, but easy to install and use admin panel for full management of your products and checkout and ready store
Just fill in your products in admin panel and start getting your first customers!

text: Free and fully-open source software. Self-hosted and non-custodial.
moreText:
Licensed under MIT license, you're free to improve and view source code of bitcart.
Your are your own bank, as you host bitcart yourself.

text: Lightning network supported out of the box
moreText: Enable lightning network just by one command!

text: Easy to deploy on any kind of server, via GUI or in a few CLI commands
moreText:
There is even an telegram bot which can install bitcart on your server.
 It is possible to install bitcart right from your phone! Or just use easy to configure and use docker installation!

text: Supporting multiple coins, APIs remain the same
moreText:
A variety of different coins is available, and you can use any of them in the same way.
Enabling new coin in docker installation is a matter of one command.

text: Powerful SDK libraries to create apps of any kind
moreText:
Powerful python SDK is available.
Or just connect to bitcart daemon from any programming language
You can even create a blockchain explorer, atomic swaps bot, or a wallet with it!
Bitcart is composed of different independent components, you can pick only the ones you need
